name: Empty Cloak
languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Diligent Sentinal
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks are designed to watch for intruders. They gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Construction
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks are designed with a delicate shadow construction. They burst into pieces, then dissipate into shadow, on a critical hit.

special_abilities.name: Wrapping Embrace
special_abilities.desc: Empty cloaks can share the same space as one Medium or smaller creature. The empty cloak has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space with it.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage

actions.name: Shadow Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage

actions.name: Shadow Snare: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft, one target. Hit: Large or smaller creatures are restrained. To escape, the restrained creature or adjacent ally must use an action to make a successful DC 14 Strength check. The shadow snare has 15 hit points and AC 12.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eonic drifter can either use Drift Backward or make two attacks with its time warping staff. The eonic drifter's future self (if present) can only use drift forward.

actions.name: Time Warping Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: +7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Drift Backward (1/Day)
actions.desc: A future self of the eonic drifter materializes in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the drifter. The future self has the eonic drifter's stats and its full hit points, and it takes its turn immediately after its present self. Killing the original eonic drifter makes its future self disappear. If the present self sees its future self die, the eonic drifter must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. There is n oeffect if the save succeeds. If the saving throw fails, roll 1d6 to determine the effect on the eonic drifter: 1 = frightened, 2 = incapacitated, 3 = paralyzed, 4 = unconscious, 5 or 6 = has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks. These effects last 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Drift Forward (2/Day)
actions.desc: The future self makes a time warping staff attack against a target. If the attack hits, instead of causing bludgeoning damage both the target and the attacker jump forward through time, effectively ceasing to exist in the present time. They reappear in the same location 1d4 rounds later, at the end of the present self's turn. Creatures occupying those locations at the moment are pushed 5 feet in a direction of their own choosing. The target of the drift (but not the future self) must then make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, with effects identical to those for the eonic drifter witnessing the death of its future self (see Drift Backward). The future self doesn't reappear after using this ability the second time; only the target of the drift reappears from the second use. This does not trigger a saving throw for the present self.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison

special_abilities.name: Spines
special_abilities.desc: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30/120ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison

special_abilities.name: Spines
special_abilities.desc: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The erina defender makes two attacks

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack, +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage

reactions.name: Protect
reactions.desc: The erina imposes disadvantage on an attack roll made against an ally within 5 feet of the erina defender

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The far darrig's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

Constant: magic weapon (antler glaive only), speak with animals
At will: calm emotions, charm animal (as charm person but affects beasts only), cure wounds, detect poison and disease, water breathing, water walk
3/day: barkskin, conjure woodland beings, hold animal (as hold person but affects beasts only), jump, longstrider
1/day: commune with nature, freedom of movement, nondetection, tree stride

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The far darrig makes four antler glaive attacks.

actions.name: Antler Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5t, or 10ft, one target, Hit: 7 (1d10 +2) slashing damage and the target must make a successful DC 13 Strength saving throw or either be disarmed or fall prone; the attacking far darrig chooses which effect occurs

actions.name: Enchanted Glaive Maneuvers
actions.desc: A far darrig can magically extend or shrink its antler glaive as a bonus action to give it either a 10-foot or 5-foot reach

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The fate eater's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: blink, hallucinatory terrain

special_abilities.name: Visionary Flesh
special_abilities.desc: Eating the flesh of a fate eater requires a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. If successful, the eater gains a divination spell. If failed, the victim vomits blood and fails the next saving throw made in combat.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 26 (5d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spectral Bite
actions.desc:
When a fate eater scores a critical hit against a target, it damages not only the creature but also the threads of its fate, changing the character's past or future. The target must roll 1d6 on the chart below for each critical hit that isn't negated by a successful DC 15 Charisma saving throw.

1 Seeing the Alternatives - Suffers the effects of the confusion spell for 1d4 rounds
2 Untied from the Loom - Character's speed is randomized for four rounds. Roll 3d20 at the start of each of the character's turns to determine his or her speed in feet that turn
3 Shifting Memories - Permanently loses 2 from a random skill and gains 2 in a random untrained skill
4 Not So Fast - Loses the use of one class ability, chosen at random
5 Lost Potential - Loses 1 point from one randomly chosed ability score
6 Took the Lesser Path - The character's current hit point total becomes his or her hit point maximum
Effect 3-6 are permanent until the character makes a successful Charisma saving throw. The saving throw is repeated after every long rest, but the DC increases by 1 after every long rest, as the character becomes more entrenched in this new destiny. Otherwise, these new fates can be undone by nothing short of a wish spell or comparable magic.

name: Fear Smith
damange_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from weapons that aren't made of cold iron

special_abilities.name: Distortion Gaze
special_abilities.desc:
Those who meet the gaze of the fear smith experience the world seeming to twist at unnatural angles beneath their feet. When a creature that can see the fear smith's eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the fear smith, the creature must make a successful DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become disoriented. While disoriented, the creature falls prone each time it tries to move or take the Dash or Disengage action. To recover from disorientation, a creature must start its turn outside the fear smith's gaze and make a successful DC 16 Wisdom saving throw.
To use this ability, the fear smith can't be incapacitated and must see the affected creature. A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes at the start of its turn to avoid the effect. In that case, no saving throw is necessary but the creature treats the fear smith as invisible until the start of the creature's next turn. If during its turn the creature chooses to look at the fear smith, it must immediately make the saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Hidden Eye
special_abilities.desc: The fear smith has advantage on saving throws against the blinded condition

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The fear smith's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16). The fear smith can innately cast the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components:
At will: detect thoughts, fear
2/day each: charm person, command, confusion

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The fear smith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fear smith makes three claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, 1 creature. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is disoriented by Distorion Gaze, this attack does an addition 13 (3d8) psychic damage and heals the fear smith by an equal amount.

actions.name: Heartstopping Stare
actions.desc: The fear smith terrifies a creature within 30 feet with a look. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 round and take 13 (3d8) psychic damage and heal the fear smith by an equal amount.

name: Fellforged
languages: any languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Expelled Spirit
special_abilities.desc: While the body the fellforged inhabits was made to bind spirits, the foul presence of the wraith within is vulnerable to turning attempts. Any successful turn attempt exorcises the wraith from its clockwork frame, but has no other effect. The expelled wraith retains its current hp total.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the fellforged has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Unnatural Aura
special_abilities.desc: All animals, whether wild or domesticated, can sense the unnatural presence of fellforged at a distance of 30 feet. They do not willingly approach nearer than that and panic if forced to do so, and they remain panicked as long as they are within that range.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fellforged makes two necrotic slam attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the total damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Violent Escapement
actions.desc: With little regard for the clockwork bodies they inhabit, fellforged wraiths can stress and strain their mechanisms in such a violent manner that flywheels become unbalanced, gears shatter, and springs snap. As a bonus action, this violent burst of gears and pulleys deal 7 (2d6) piercing damage to all foes within 5 feet who fail a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. Each use of this ability imposes a cumulative reduction in movement of 5 feet upon the fellforged. If its speed is reduced to 0 feet, the fellforged become paralyzed.

name: Fext
damange_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage with nonmagical weapons
languages: the languages spoken by its patron

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The fext's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

At will: hex
1/day each: hold monster, true seeing

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The fext has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapon
special_abilities.desc: The fext's weapon attacks are magical

special_abilities.name: Patron Blessing
special_abilities.desc: The fext is infused with a portion of their patrons power. They have an Armor Class equal to 10 + their Charisma modifier + their Dexterity modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fext makes two melee or ranged attacks

actions.name: Eldritch Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Fury
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 60/200 ft, one creature. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.

name: Bear King
damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing from nonmagical weapons that aren't made of cold iron

special_abilities.name: Alternate Form
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the Bear King canassume the form of a shaggy grizzly bear, or a hybrid of his humanoid and bear forms. In alternate form the Bear King's size increases to Large, and he can make bite and claw attacks. He remains in this form until he returns to human form as a bonus action or he falls unconscious or dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The Bear King has advantage on Perception (Wisdom) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
special_abilities.desc: If the Bear King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration (Alternate Form only)
special_abilities.desc: The Bear King regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear king makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks. In hybrid or grizzly bear form he can also make one additional bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Grizzly or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage. A target creature other than a construct or undead must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of its turns or lose 10 (3d6) hit points from blood loss. Each time the Bear King hits the wounded creature with this attack, the hit point loss increases by 10 (3d6). A creature can take an action to staunch the bleeding on itself or an adjacent ally with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The bleeding also stops if the creature recieves any magical healing.

actions.name: Claws (Grizzly or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Maul (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. A creature hit by two maul attacks in the same turn must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

actions.name: Javelin (Human Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 30/60 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Melee Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The Bear King makes a claw or maul attack.

legendary_actions.name: Honey Toss
legendary_actions.desc: The Bear King reaches into the jar he carries at his side and hurls a glob of honey at a target within 30 feet as a ranged weapon attack (+9 to hit). If the attack hits, the creature is restrained (escape DC 17).

legendary_actions.name: Frightful Roar (2 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Bear King lets out a blood-curdling roar. All creatures within 90 feet who can hear the Bear King must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature that makes its save, or who the effect ends for, is immune to the Frightful Roar for 24 hours. The bear king's allies are unaffected.

name: Lord of the Hunt
damange_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from weapons that aren't made of cold iron

special_abilities.name: Expert Rider
special_abilities.desc: While the Lord of the Hunt is mounted, any attack directed at his steed targets the rider instead. The steed uses the Lord of the Hunt's saving throws. If the mount succeeds on a saving throw against a damaging effect, it takes no damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The lord of the hunt's innate spellcasting ability score is Charisma (save DC 16). The Lord of the Hunt can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

At will:druidcraft, hunter's mark, phantom steed
3/day each: commune with nature, conjure volley.
1/day: conjure fey (conjured creatures vanish if the Lord of the Hunt's concentration is broken)

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
special_abilities.desc: If the Lord of the Hunt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The Lord of the Hunt's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lord of the Hunt makes three melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

actions.name: Huntsman's Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60/120 ft, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage or 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage if used in two hands, plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. If the target is acreature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. As a bonus action, the Lord of the Hunt can cause his spear to magically appear in his hand, even if it is destroyed.

actions.name: Howling Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 150/600 ft, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The Lord of the Hunt adds 3 to his AC against one attack that would hit him. To do so, he must see the attackerand must be weilding a melee weapon.

legendary_actions.name: Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of the Hunt makes a huntsman's spear attack or a howling longbow.

legendary_actions.name: Tenacious Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of the Hunt moves half his speed, or half the speed of any steed he rides.

legendary_actions.name: Call the Hunt (2 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of the Hunt blows his hunting horn and chooses one creature he can see within 60 feet. If the creature can hear the horn, it must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the Lord of the Hunt for 8 hours. A charmed creature joins the wild hunt, and follows the verbal instructions of the Lord of the Hunt, treating all former allies as enemies. If a charmed creature damages or is damaged by a former ally, it can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Call of the Hunt for the next 24 hours.

name: Moonlit King
damange_resistances: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from weapons that aren't made of cold iron.
senses: blightsight 30 ft, darkvision 120 ft, passive Perception 20
languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Elvish, Infernal, Umbral; telepathy 100 ft.

special_abilities.name: Control Moonlight
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the Moonlit King can cause all areas of moonlight within 100 feet to move up to 10 feet.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The Moonlit King's innate spellcasting ability score is Charisma (save DC19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). The Moonlit King can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

At will: continual flame, detect evil and good, invisibility (self only), moonbeam, zone of truth
3/day each: blight, dispel evil and good, dispel
1/day each: demiplane, heal

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
special_abilities.desc: It the Moonlit King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The Moonlit King's weapon attacks are magical, and deal an extra 7 (2d6) radiant damage (included below).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Moonlit King makes three attacks with either his crystal staff or his moon bolt.

actions.name: Crystal Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) radiant damage. A target that is struck by the staff two or more times in one turn must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Moon Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft, one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) radiant damage. If the target is a creature in a form other than its natural form, it takes an additional 22 (4d10) radiant damage and must succeed on a DC 19 Charisma saving throw or revert to its natural form. When the moon bolt hits a target, moonlight glows in a 10-feet radius from that point, creating dim light. The light is stationary and lasts until the end of the Moonlit King's next turn.

actions.name: Fearful Shadows (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The Moonlit King magically animates the shadows of all foes within 60 feet of himself. The animated shadows attack the creatures who cast them. All affected creaetures in the area take 35 (10d6) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successfull DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. A creature that fails the saving throw also loses 1d4 points from its Strength score. A creature reduced to 0 Strength is unconscious until it regains at least 1 point of Strength. Strength lost to fearful shadows returns when the creature finishes a short or long rest.

actions.name: Summon Devil (1/Day)
actions.desc: The Moonlit King magically summons a lunar devil. The summoned devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other devils. It remains for 10 minutes, until its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Shadow Slip
reaction.desc: The Moonlit King takes on the quality of his manifest delusions when he is targeted by an attacker he can see. He becomes nearly insubstantial, so that the attack roll is made with disadvantage. If the attack hits, the Moonlit King takes half damage.

legendary_actions.name: Staff
legendary_actions.desc: The Moonlit King makes a crystal staff attack.

legendary_actions.name: Lightwalking
legendary_actions.desc: The Moonlight King teleports from one area of moonlight to another within 100 feet.

legendary_actions.name: Aura of Madness (2 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: While he is standing in an area of moonlight, the Moonlit King can spread his madness to other creatures within 30 feet. A creature other than a fiend that starts its turn in the aura or enters it for the first time on a turn (including when the aura is created) must succeed on a DC 19 Charisma saving throw or be confused (as if affected by the confusion spell) until the start of its next turn. The aura lasts until the start of the Moonlit King's next turn.

name: Queen of Night and Magic
damage_immunities: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from weapons that aren't made of cold iron
languages: Celestial, Common, Elvish, Sylvan, Umbral; telepathy 120 ft.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
special_abilities.desc: If the Queen of Night and Magic fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic has advantage on saving throws against spells.

special_abilities.name: Shadowborn
special_abilities.desc: When in lighting other than bright light, the Queen of Night and Magic has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and she can hide even while being observed.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The Queen of Night and Magic is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). The Queen knows the following sorcerer spells:

Cantrips (at will): blade ward, chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): darkness, mirror image, shield
3rd level (3 slots): blink, fear
4th level (3 slots): confusion, greater invisibility
5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, teleportation circle
6th level (1 slot): circle of death
7th level (1 slot): plane shift, prismatic spray
8th level (1 slot): dominate monster
9th level (1 slot): meteor swarm

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic makes three attacks with her rapier or with star strike.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Shadow Rift (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic creaets a shadowy rift in a 20-foot sphere. Any creature within the rift takes 72 (16d8) cold damage, or half damage with a successful DC 23 Constitution saving throw. Creatures that fail the saving throw are also restrained by icy wisps of shadow. A restrained creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the restrained condition on a success.

actions.name: Star Strike
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +15 to hit, range 120 ft, one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) fire damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic teleports to an unoccupied space up to 60 feet away.

actions.name: Unravel
actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic targets a creature, object, or magical effect that she can see. For every spell affecting the target, the Queen makes a Charisma check: the DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the spell is dispelled.

reactions.name: Sudden Fraying
reactions.desc: When the Queen of Night and Magic is targeted by a spell or included in a spell's area, she can use her Unravel ability on it. The Queen does not need to see a spice to target it with this reaction, but she must be able to see at least some portion of an area or object affected by the spell.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic makes one star strike attack. Having a foe within 5 feet of the Queen doesn't cause this attack to be made with disadvantage.

legendary_actions.name: Swirling Stars
legendary_actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic makes one star strike attack. Having a foe within 5 feet of the Queen doesn't cause this attack to be made with disadvantage.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic uses her Teleport ability.

legendary_actions.name: Spell (2 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Queen of Night and Magic casts a spell.
